description: When the tweet data was fetched from Twitter
name: fetched_at

description: If the tweet is a reply, id of the user that it replies to
name: in_reply_to_user_id

description: Number of times the tweet was retweeted, at the time of fetching the data
name: retweet_count

description: Number of times the tweet was replied to, at the time of fetching the data
name: reply_count

description: Number of times the tweet was liked, at the time of fetching the data
name: like_count

description: Number of times the tweet was quoted, at the time of fetching the data
name: quote_count

description: An array of user handles mentioned in the tweet
name: mentioned_users

description: An array of URLs mentioned in the tweet
name: mentioned_urls

description: An array of hashtags mentioned in the tweet
name: mentioned_hashtags
